ValidationRule.description: AD-303 Bid Start Date to be validated against the award date and the RFI/RFP dates. Only perform this validation when one of the dates (Process Start Date, RFI Submitted Date, RFP Submitted Date) is changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c, RecordType.DeveloperName != "Target", NOT((TEXT(StageName) = "7. Closed Won")), OR( Bid_Start_Date__c > RFI_Submitted_Date__c, Bid_Start_Date__c > RFP_Submitted_Date__c ), OR( /* Only trigger validation when at least one of the dates is changed to minimise flow errors */ ISCHANGED(Bid_Start_Date__c), ISCHANGED(RFI_Submitted_Date__c), ISCHANGED(RFP_Submitted_Date__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Process Start Date must be prior to the RFI/RFP submitted dates
